word:
"DEAR SISTER WHITE: IT BECOMES MY PAINFUL DUTY TO WRITE TO YOU CONCERNING THE CASE OF BROTHER WILLIAM E. OF HIS PAST HISTORY AND LIFE, IT IS NOT NECESSARY TO 
                                                                           232
WRITE, AS YOU ARE SUFFICIENTLY ACQUAINTED WITH THE FACTS, SINCE HIS CASE WAS BROUGHT BEFORE YOU BY A LETTER FROM ELDER C. F. MCVAGH, DATED AUGUST 15, 1911. I AM SORRY IT BECOMES NECESSARY TO BRING THIS CASE BEFORE YOU AGAIN.
